## Checklist

<!-- Use the appropriate section for this gardening type -->

### Retrospective
- [ ] What went well
- [ ] What went poorly  
- [ ] Process improvements identified
- [ ] Improvements added to next sprint
- [ ] Learnings stored in hivemind

### Sprint Planning
- [ ] Review backlog priorities
- [ ] Select stories for sprint
- [ ] Verify all stories have TDD instructions
- [ ] Identify HITL gates
- [ ] Update prd.json with sprint
- [ ] Verify dependencies are unblocked

### Backlog Grooming
- [ ] Review stale issues (>14 days)
- [ ] Verify issue descriptions are complete
- [ ] Update priorities
- [ ] Close obsolete issues
- [ ] Add missing labels
- [ ] Link related issues

### Update Affected Issues
- [ ] Check issues blocked by completed work
- [ ] Update labels (blocked â†’ ready)
- [ ] Update epic checkboxes
- [ ] Close completed epics
- [ ] Update PRD.md with current state
